department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Atef Bader holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from IIT. He has been working in the industry for many years, <br>and currently he is a member of technical staff at Lucent Technologies. He is a recognized expert in the areas of <br>object-oriented technology, automated software testing, concurrent software systems, and software architecture.<br> He has published a number of technical papers in numerous conferences and technical journals.
